column10: Just come and relax
column12: My stay has been a great experience in this unique BB. The facilities are excellent, with great surroundings and ambience. Since there’s only two rooms, there’s wonderful privacy, silence, solitude. The local breakfast is amazingly delicious and freshly cooked each morning. And it’s served in the rooftop overseeing the area and beach. The walk to the nice stretch of beach is a breeze. The host is great help in every way and very accommodating. I highly recommend this place for your private hangout.

column6: {'id': '8669735', 'name': 'The Residence Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.139847, 'longitude': 80.10202, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d8669735-Reviews-The_Residence_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.theresidencehikkaduwa.com', 'address': '24B Amarasena Mw, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '24B Amarasena Mw', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 4, 'count5': 349}}
column12:
This is a stand-out boutique hotel. Every detail has been carefully considered to give guests the best and most comfortable stay. 

The rooms/apartments are huge and so tastefully decorated with  flowers and bright woven fabrics. Linens are luxurious and towels are big and thick. There are USB plugs, plenty of bottled water, great toiletries, a rechargeable torch, tea, coffee, biscuits. 

The pool is lovely and the lounges comfortable,

Security is excellent and the place is quiet. 

Breakfast is always generous with the best fresh fruit, fresh juice, eggs and toast - and always a lovely sweet surprise to follow. Coconut pancakes are a favorite! 

Charmara, the host really engages with his guests to make sure they have everything they need and that they are happy. He can offer help with rides, excursions and advice about restaurants and facilities at Hikkaduwa ( like the best dive schools etc). 

This was my second visit and I will certainly be coming back soon. Thank you for a wonderful stay
column13: Best hotel, best host in Hikkaduwa

column6: {'id': '8669735', 'name': 'The Residence Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.139847, 'longitude': 80.10202, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d8669735-Reviews-The_Residence_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.theresidencehikkaduwa.com', 'address': '24B Amarasena Mw, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '24B Amarasena Mw', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 4, 'count5': 349}}
column12: We vacationed in April 24 together with my husband. I would like to note the excellent combination of price and quality of this property! The villa has only two identical rooms on the 1st and 2nd floors, the room is very large, it can comfortably accommodate three people (there is 1 double and 1 single bed), the room is impeccably clean, snow-white bed sheets, towels, towels for the pool are provided separately. The room has a good, fresh renovation, everything is quite modern, there are bathrobes, all the accessories for a comfortable stay (shower gel, shampoo, some other little things). Excellent breakfasts, every day we were served fruit (watermelon, bananas, mango, papaya), smoothies, coffee with milk, scrambled eggs with sausages, toast, and they were constantly supplemented with something new. It’s impossible to eat everything)) The villa’s grounds are very well maintained, a nice swimming pool, a very attentive owner who was ready to resolve any issue as quickly as possible. It felt like we were visiting good friends. Location: The villa is a five-minute walk from the main road, which runs parallel to the coast. There are different cafes nearby, we usually chose Google Maps based on reviews and went to different places. For those who are planning an independent trip around the island, the location is also very convenient, as the bus station and railway station are within walking distance. In general, I recommend this villa for those who are tired of the huge number of people in hotels and want to relax purely with their family or company, while receiving good service and comfortable accommodation.
column13: wonderful villa for a relaxing holiday

column12: This was one of the best stays in Sri Lanka. First and foremost, the owner was very communicative and spoke English excellently. Upon arrival, we noticed that the room was extremely spacious, clean, and lacked nothing. The breakfast was delicious and served in two options: continental and Sri Lankan, with a lovely view from the rooftop. Additionally, the property had a pool and lounge chairs, where you could relax after a long day.Despite the short duration of our stay, the presence of flowers everywhere added a charming atmosphere. Thank you once again, I highly recommend this place! 🙂

column6: {'id': '8669735', 'name': 'The Residence Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.139847, 'longitude': 80.10202, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d8669735-Reviews-The_Residence_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.theresidencehikkaduwa.com', 'address': '24B Amarasena Mw, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '24B Amarasena Mw', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 4, 'count5': 349}}
column12:
Immaculate property with only 2 units within a few minutes walk to the beach and shops. This is a busy area but at The Residence you are in a quiet tropical paradise. There is a private pool excellent for relaxing in. The unit was exceptional, large,clean and every little detail thought of. The staff were friendly and made delicious breakfasts of our choice, either western or Sri Lankan. Chamara solved all our problems in getting to the airport.As well he arranged a cooking class and tour around Hikkaduwa.
I highly recommend this property and was by far the best place we stayed in while visiting Sri Lanka.

column12: Lovely hotel situated close to the beach and Main Street. Large rooms and lovely shower. Easy walk to shops and restaurants. Attentive and friendly staff who made us feel welcome and couldn’t do enough for us. Lovely pool and sun loungers. Clean and tidy. Great value for money would highly recommend.

column6: {'id': '8669735', 'name': 'The Residence Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.139847, 'longitude': 80.10202, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d8669735-Reviews-The_Residence_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.theresidencehikkaduwa.com', 'address': '24B Amarasena Mw, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '24B Amarasena Mw', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 4, 'count5': 349}}
column10: Ask the host Chamara for any advice/tips on the local area or beyond. He's very knowledgeable and helpful.
column12:
We had a fantastic stay at The Residence Hikkaduwah. 

We stayed in the villa on the ground floor and it was extremely comfortable. It's very spacious and has a large comfortable bed and an additional single bed in the room. It had all the amenities that you would expect for a luxury room; air conditioning, plenty of international power sockets, mini bar, complimentary water, TV, Tea and Coffee, WiFİ and optional Breakfast. 

The location is excellent, just a short 5 min stroll to the main street and a further 5 min to the beach and the bay where you can see turtles, and baby turtles being released for the first time since hatching in the evening. 

Chamara, our host was friendly and very helpful. He arranged transfers to the hotel and made lots of great recommendations for places to eat in the area. He was always very responsive via WhatsApp if we had any questions prior to or during the stay there.

column6: {'id': '8669735', 'name': 'The Residence Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.139847, 'longitude': 80.10202, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d8669735-Reviews-The_Residence_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.theresidencehikkaduwa.com', 'address': '24B Amarasena Mw, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '24B Amarasena Mw', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 4, 'count5': 349}}
column10: Ask Chamara to took you out on a trip. We had a fantastic day out!
column12:
On the last part of our trip, we decided to stay in Hikkaduwa for some well-deserved rest after touring around this magnificent island. The driver from The Residence picked us up from our hotel in Colombo and delivered us safely to Hikkaduwa.

Wow what a place! There are only 2 rooms at The Residence, both are decorated really well. The bathroom has a separate toilet one side and shower the other. The rainfall shower is really good! The room also has a large double bed, air conditioning, TV with satellite channels, well stocked fridge  and hairdryer. We were on the upper floor and had a great view of the pool....

We had breakfast every morning at 9am and we ate at the table outside our room. The breakfasts are also really good!

The pool and 4 sunbeds just make it extra special as privacy is guaranteed along with the personal service!

Finally, the location. The Residence is located around 200mts from the main strip and only 300mts or so from the bus station and train station. Ideal if you are travelling around! 

Chamara and his staff work extremely hard and you can tell. This place is a gem. Will we back? I'm certain  of it!

column6: {'id': '8669735', 'name': 'The Residence Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.139847, 'longitude': 80.10202, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d8669735-Reviews-The_Residence_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.theresidencehikkaduwa.com', 'address': '24B Amarasena Mw, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '24B Amarasena Mw', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 4, 'count5': 349}}
column10: Fabulous accommodation close to beach, restaurants and amenities. The host offers transfers and excursions at very reasonable costs.
column12: Highly recommended. Just had wonderful stay at the Residence. The property is in a great location. It is immaculately presented and offers spacious  accommodation with a lovely private garden and pool. Delicious breakfast options are served on the upper terrace. The  host Chamari is delightful.

column6: {'id': '8669735', 'name': 'The Residence Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.139847, 'longitude': 80.10202, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d8669735-Reviews-The_Residence_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.theresidencehikkaduwa.com', 'address': '24B Amarasena Mw, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '24B Amarasena Mw', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 4, 'count5': 349}}
column12: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at The Residence with Chamara and his family. They were friendly, helpful and easy to contact when necessary. The apartment was very clean and spacious with an efficient air conditioner. The Residence has a nice outdoor area with a pool and lounge chairs. Our breakfast was served on the balcony and was fresh and delicious.
column13: Relaxing stay in a quiet location.

column6: {'id': '8669735', 'name': 'The Residence Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.139847, 'longitude': 80.10202, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d8669735-Reviews-The_Residence_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.theresidencehikkaduwa.com', 'address': '24B Amarasena Mw, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '24B Amarasena Mw', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 4, 'count5': 349}}
column12:
Lovely stay. Wished we had stayed longer 

From our arrival we were welcomed by Chamara and his family. The hotel is situated a small walk from the main road, at the back of his private residence. 

The beach is within a short walk down the road. There are a few nice bars towards the railway line and a nice breakfast/lunch outlet on the corner. 

Beautiful apartments and work was continuing to improve them although we don’t think this was needed. 

Chamara was contactable throughout our stay and was available to answer any questions we had. 

It was my birthday whilst we stayed and everyone wished happy birthday, and given flowers and a small cake. Perfect little touches! 

On our last morning Chamara also took us to our next destination. I believe he also does tours of booked in advance. 

There are only 2 rooms so get booking quickly! We will definitely Recommend to others and book again if we return! 

Thank you 😊

column6: {'id': '8669735', 'name': 'The Residence Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.139847, 'longitude': 80.10202, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d8669735-Reviews-The_Residence_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.theresidencehikkaduwa.com', 'address': '24B Amarasena Mw, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '24B Amarasena Mw', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 4, 'count5': 349}}
column12:
The Residence is a sublime experience from the moment you enter the property, which is situated on a quiet lane about 200 metres from the beach.

Charmera greets guests and explains the features of the room, the appliances, services like yoga and Ayurvedic massage and trips which can be arranged. 

The room itself is a 5-star designer suite with careful attention to even the smallest detail. There are comfortable chairs on the wide balcony and a breakfast table. The room itself is spacious with plenty of natural light and thoughtfully designed electric light throughout. USB ports were really appreciated. 

WC and shower are conveniently separated with a vanity and wide bench between these two rooms. 

The decor makes this room. Tasteful understated furnishings and interesting wall niches add to the practical charm of this well-designed space. 

The bed was really comfortable and security excellent. 

Breakfast is generous and exquisitely presented with plenty of fresh juice, fruits, and Sri Lankan options. 

I felt truly pampered here and enjoyed the interior and the pool area downstairs, which is also charming.

Charmara is attentive to guests’ needs and is very willing to go the extra mile to make each stay happy and memorable.
column13: Outstanding five star boutique hotel at a reasonable price

column6: {'id': '8669735', 'name': 'The Residence Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 353, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.139847, 'longitude': 80.10202, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d8669735-Reviews-The_Residence_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.theresidencehikkaduwa.com', 'address': '24B Amarasena Mw, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '24B Amarasena Mw', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 0, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 0, 'count4': 4, 'count5': 349}}
column10: Skip the hassle of dealing with local airport taxi drivers upon arrival at Colombo and book transportation directly through The Residence.
column12:
We stayed with our family at The Residence Hikkaduwa for two weeks, enjoying Ayurveda treatments. The mansion offered complete privacy, featuring a private pool, garden, rooftop terrace, and two spacious rooms with balconies. Our children especially loved the sunset evenings with BBQ on the rooftop, offering spectacular views.
The villa's location is incredibly convenient, just two hundred meters from the beach, minimarts, restaurants, and spas. The owner recommended a yoga session that we enjoyed in the garden and sometimes on the beach. Airport transfers to and from Colombo International Airport were provided by a nice van, and our host welcomed us warmly to Sri Lanka.
Daily breakfast, offering a list of options combining local traditional food and international breakfast, was served, accompanied by tasty freshly brewed local coffee. We are planning to return before the end of this year.
The easiest way to secure your booking and get a good deal is to contact them via WhatsApp. We were impressed by how quickly we received all the information and confirmations from The Residence reservation manager.
column13: An Unforgettable Escape: Our Excellent Stay at The Residence Hikkaduwa

column12:
Hidden Gem in Hikkaduwa! It's the BEST accommodation in Sri Lanka! All small details has been thought by the owner. Spotless clean, large bed, large room with many stylish touch with full of amenities in the room, perfect swimming pool.
Breakfast is served on the balcony and extremely tasty freshly made. You will be surprised how tasty it's!
There are only 2 rooms. I hope that you will be lucky to find an empty slot.

column6: {'id': '9981492', 'name': 'Villa Saffron Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 376, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.12215, 'longitude': 80.11331, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d9981492-Reviews-Villa_Saffron_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.villasaffron.com/', 'address': '776 Galle Road Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '776 Galle Road', 'street2': 'Thiranagama', 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 14, 'count5': 356}}
column12: We stayed here with a couple of friends and Sunil was very welcoming and all his staff very attentive.  The rooms were clean, the decor was amazing, the showers were exceptionally good and powerful and the pool was a dream.  Being able to get on the beach at the bottom of the garden was amazing and the outside furniture to rest was very comfortable.  The chef produced some delicious, highly presented food, there was no need to go elsewhere.  We all loved our 2 night stay and everything was made perfect by Sunil and his staff.  I would highly recommend going to this villa.
column13: Amazing location in a beautifully decorated villa on the beach

column6: {'id': '9981492', 'name': 'Villa Saffron Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 376, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.12215, 'longitude': 80.11331, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d9981492-Reviews-Villa_Saffron_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.villasaffron.com/', 'address': '776 Galle Road Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '776 Galle Road', 'street2': 'Thiranagama', 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 14, 'count5': 356}}
column10: Parking is available, ask the staff for anything you need, if you want to eat out you can easily reach Hikkaduwa town on foot and there are some nice restaurants around.
column12:
The property is just beautiful! Done in the open tropical villa style, with  well appointed spacious rooms, beautiful decor, a gorgeous tiled pool and easy beach access, it was a treat for the eyes. There was a beautiful courtyard as well, with the concept of a controlled tropical jungle garden.

Special word of appreciation to Mr Sunil and his helpful, attentive staff. They make the best Sri Lankan milk tea! ☺️ All the food we ordered was fabulous, they accommodated all our requests (extra cups of tea during the day!) and went above and beyond to be helpful and attentive.

We really appreciated the peace, calm and quiet as well as the safety offered for a group of female travellers! Would fully recommend it and will definitely be returning!

column6: {'id': '9981492', 'name': 'Villa Saffron Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 376, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.12215, 'longitude': 80.11331, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d9981492-Reviews-Villa_Saffron_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.villasaffron.com/', 'address': '776 Galle Road Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '776 Galle Road', 'street2': 'Thiranagama', 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 14, 'count5': 356}}
column12: Stayed only 1 night after a long flight. The manager Sunis and his staff try to take care of you to the maximum. Dinner was delicious and breakfast very extensive and as an extra pancakes for our children. Furthermore, the small-scale accommodation has a nice swimming pool and you walk through a private gate to the beach. Very special and also a relaxing place to stay for a few nights. Only downside was that in one room the air conditioning did not cool enough, luckily there was also a ceiling fan.

column6: {'id': '9981492', 'name': 'Villa Saffron Hikkaduwa', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 376, 'locationString': 'Hikkaduwa, Galle District, Southern Province', 'latitude': 6.12215, 'longitude': 80.11331, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g304134-d9981492-Reviews-Villa_Saffron_Hikkaduwa-Hikkaduwa_Galle_District_Southern_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.villasaffron.com/', 'address': '776 Galle Road Thiranagama, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '776 Galle Road', 'street2': 'Thiranagama', 'city': 'Hikkaduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80240'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 3, 'count2': 0, 'count3': 3, 'count4': 14, 'count5': 356}}
column10: The location of Villa Saffron is perfect, close to everything Hikkaduwa has to offer it is also only a stones throw away from Galle.
column12: An absolute "Gem" located in the South of Sri Lanka, this is a "MUST STAY AT" Boutique Villa in Hikkaduwa. The room we stayed in (Cinnamon) was fabulous and the ensuite with it's open bathroom made our stay a really comfortable one. The staff consisting of Manager Sunil, Chef Chaminda, Kasun who served us our Breakfast with a smile every morning and Ambrose who was always there to check on our welfare were amazing! The entire team at Villa Saffron really understands what hospitality is and means and for that we give them "10 out of 10"!
column13: An Absolute "Gem" located in the South of Sri Lanka, Villa Saffron Hikkaduwa, is truly a piece of Paradise!

column12:
The atmosphere at Villa Saffron was absolutely luxurious and amazing. Situated right on the Hikkaduwa beach the boutique villa was gorgeously furnished and decorated and very comfortable.
Sunil, Chaminda and the staff were so amazing and accommodating during our stay. 
The food was out of this world and regardless of the cuisine every dish was so made perfectly and tasted so good!
Overall staying at Villa Saffron was fantastic and such a good holiday!

column12: We don’t have enough superlatives to describe our stay at Villa Saffron. When we stepped through the front gate we felt like we were escaping from the bustling town into an oasis of calm. The villa is a beautiful construction in itself and it has been very tastefully furnished by the owners.  The rooms are spacious and we felt at home immediately. It wasn’t just the environment that made us feel at home. We very much appreciated the warm welcome and attention to detail provided by Sunil, the manager. Sunil took time to get to know us and our personal preferences which meant that he gave a high level of personal service that you don’t get in other properties. The rest of the team also made sure that everything was perfect for our stay;  the delicious food served, the spotless garden area and the cleanliness of the whole villa. Last but not least, the pool and the view over the beach just took our breath away and we spent many an hour gazing at the trees, beach and waves. Villa Saffron will recharge anyone’s batteries. We will recommend this place to everyone we know and hope to come back soon. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

column10: head to the asian jewell restaurant for dinner - of the beaten track but 5 star
column12:
Our stay at Villa Saffron Hikkaduwa was nothing short of spectacular, far exceeding our expectations in every aspect. Visiting at the start of the off-season, we were delighted to find that we practically had the entire villa to ourselves, providing an intimate and exclusive experience.

The villa's staff were outstanding; their attention to detail and genuine care ensured our stay was comfortable and memorable. The facilities at the villa were first-class—everything was clean and well-maintained, from the spacious interiors of the rooms, huge bathrooms, to the expansive balcony offering plenty of privacy. The ambiance was perfect for relaxation and unwinding.

One of the highlights was the food prepared on-site; it was simply first-class, rivaling top restaurants in flavor and presentation. Having the ability to walk straight out to the ocean and enjoy a clean, serene beach was the cherry on top of our relaxing stay.

While the villa isn't close to major shopping areas, it didn't detract from our experience as the tranquility and beauty of the location were exactly what we needed after days of travel and sightseeing. Villa Saffron is the perfect place to recharge, making it an ideal retreat for adults looking for a peaceful getaway.

We highly recommend Villa Saffron Hikkaduwa and are already looking forward to our next visit. It's truly more suited for an adult retreat, offering a slice of paradise for those seeking a serene escape.
column13: Serene and Luxurious Stay at Villa Saffron Hikkaduwa - A Hidden Paradise!

column12:
Villa Saffron is easily one of the best coastal villas I have been to. From the ambience, to the beautiful location, this villa ticks all the boxes. I want to give a special thank you to Sunil, Kasun and the rest of the staff at the villa who were incredibly hospitable and catered to all our needs. A second special thank you to the in-house chef who dished up some mouth watering food which was honestly better than most restaurants around the area. 

We would definitely go back to this beautiful place and I can easily recommend it to anyone looking for a relaxing vacation on the coast!
column13: A top tier villa in Sri Lanka

column12: Unique experience - quiet beach far enough from the hustle of Hikkaduwa. Just 5 rooms / suites. Stayed in „Saffron“-suite with whirlpool on balcony. Antiques in the room and all over the very tastefully furnished place. Excellent service. Food on star-level absolutely worth its price ! The manager , Sunil , takes care of you and everything : Feel at home and be surrounded by luxury and that unique tropical touch. We‘ll be back !

column10: No tips, enough suncreme, Nice beachbars, safe walks on the beach, even at night. Swimming in the sea, have diner at the restaurant
column12: Villa Seffron in Sri Lanka is a true paradise for travelers seeking authenticity and privacy. The intimate setting ensures a cozy atmosphere, while the spacious rooms offer a sense of luxury. The fantastic pool is an oasis of tranquility, and the fact that you can walk straight onto the beach from the villa is a real plus. The food is delicious, and the manager, Nival, deserves all the praise for perfectly arranging everything you need. In short, Villa Seffron is a place you never want to leave.
column13: "Escape to Paradise: Experience Tranquility and Luxury at Villa Seffron, Sri Lanka"

column12:
This is our second visit to Saffron Villas and it was like time had stood still.
A warm friendly Sri Lankan welcome. The same faces, warm, helpful, discreet and kind.
Just 5 rooms you feel you are staying in your own private villas. Lovely pool, delightful room. Direct access onto the most wonderful beach.
Situated on the edge of town far enough away to feel peaceful but a walk away if you want more activity.
The villas has been so beautifully and sympathetically restored and furnishings reflect that as does the artwork.
Dining is simple. Bring your own alcohol. Fridge and kettle in rooms make all the difference for such a relaxed location.
Definitely return visit in the diary.

column12: Villa Saffron is such a gorgeous property. Architecturally designed with beautiful touches.  It is definitely a private home not a hotel kind of place, which is exactly what we wanted. We had the largest room there (Saffron) up on the first floor with a huge external balcony too, overlooking the pool/ocean. All the other rooms looked lovely too, all with there own special features. We ate well, sitting on the terrace enjoying the delicious food and relative calm. The grounds were very well looked after and it was a lovely place to sit and chill by the pool. The surf was a short walk up the beach, the main reason for staying in that area, and did not disappoint. The non-surfer was equally happy walking on the beach and just enjoying Villa Saffron! Sunil and his team were incredible…..could not fault their attention to detail and were always available, yet very discreet, should anything be needed.  What a great team…..thank you so much.

column12:
My stay at Villa Saffron in Hikaduwa was nothing short of exceptional. Tucked away from the bustling road, this quiet retreat provided the perfect escape. The highlight was undoubtedly the outstanding staff, with Manager Surin leading the way in ensuring a memorable experience.

The location strikes a perfect balance—serene and peaceful, yet just a swift 5-minute journey to the vibrant restaurant and shopping hub. The villa’s limited size, with only 5 rooms, lends an intimate atmosphere that adds to the charm.

A piece of advice: book the rooms on 1st floor to enjoy added privacy. The ground floor lacks the seclusion found in the upper levels. 

Overall, Villa Saffron is a hidden gem, offering tranquility and top-notch service.

column12:
This was our second trip to Villa Saffron and it certainly won’t be our last. It truly feels like a home from home due to the way the amazing staff cater for every need and go above and beyond to make your stay a success. Truly impossible not to feel relaxed here. 
The location is perfect, literally right on the beach and easy to get to all that Hikkaduwa has to offer. 
The villa itself is beautifully designed; tasteful and supremely comfortable. 
Sincerely can not wait to return!
column13: Wonderful home from home in SL

column10: The sea is very strong so not suitable for all swimmers but the pool at the villa is beautiful and perfect
column12: Our second visit to Villa Saffron and it still remains one of my favourite places on the planet. This time a group of 8, family and friends and we took over the entire house. The house design and decor both inside and out is simply beautiful and the beachfront location is breathtaking but what makes your stay the most relaxing holiday you could ever hope to have are the wonderful caring brilliant team of people who look after you. From manager Sunhil who believes that the customer is God to Kasoon whose smile lights up a room to Malindu who cares for the pool and every sunbathing need to Chuminda the Chef who conjures up fantastic meals from daily breakfasts to incredible Crab Curry by the sea. Everyone goes above and beyond including Milinda the owner who popped by during our stay and arranged medical care for one of our party by calling in help from his friends. Villa Saffron is a piece of paradise on Hikkaduwa beach and we will definitely be back. Thank you Sunhil and your wonderful team for looking after us so well. We miss you already
column13: A piece of paradise on Hikkaduwa Beach
